product_name: Shimano R107 Road Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Shimano R107 road bike shoes are a nimble and durable performance bike shoe built with the recreational rider in mind. Tough, stretch-resistant synthetic leather and mesh uppers provide just the right mix of durabililty and comfort. Ratcheting microadjustable buckle and 2 offset rip-and-stick straps supply a precise, snug fit without pressure points. Ergonomic last puts foot in the most efficient postion on the up stroke. A low-profile carbon-fiber plate provides a lightweight, stiff and efficient platform; the glass-fiber reinforced polyamide outsole supports an effective power transfer. SPD, SPD-SL, Time, Look and Crank Brothers cleat compatible. Cleats not included.
short_description: The Shimano R107 road bike shoes are a nimble and durable performance bike shoe built with the recreational rider in mind.
